sentences.en: These ideas may seem tame today, but they were inflammatory in his time.
sentences.cn: 这些想法今天看来也许是平淡乏味的，但在他那个时代却是很有煽动性的。

sentences.en: In general, many lifestyle medicine physicians recommend a plant-based diet—particularly for people with diabetes or other inflammatory conditions.
sentences.cn: 通常，许多生活方式医学医师推荐一种以植物为主的饮食——特别是对于糖尿病或其他炎症性疾病的患者。

sentences.en: That is, the bodies of these happy people are preparing them for bacterial threats by activating the pro-inflammatory response.
sentences.cn: 也就是说，这些快乐的人的身体通过激活促炎症反应来为应对细菌的威胁做好准备。
